attributes.action: Create set grade boundaries for new GCSE students.
attributes.background: It is unfair to pupils, as currently, the top 20% of grade 7 pupils will receive a grade 9. Meaning your grades are dependant on how other people do.

rejection.details:
Grade boundaries aren't decided by the Government or Parliament. They are set by exam boards.

You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/gcse-and-a-level-exams-how-marking-and-grading-works
